titles.title: To amend Public Law 105-188 to provide for the mineral leasing of certain Indian lands in Oklahoma.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 4/28/1999--Introduced. Amends Public Law 105-188 (relating to the mineral leasing of Indian lands located on the Fort Berthold Indian Reservation) to provide for the mineral leasing of Indian lands located on specified former Indian Reservations in Oklahoma.
